2022.question: Find the value of the determinant $\begin{vmatrix} 23 & 12 & 11 \ 36 & 10 & 26 \ 63 & 26 & 37 \end{vmatrix}$.

2023.question: Find the value of the determinant $\begin{vmatrix} 1 & 2 & 4 \ 1 & 3 & 6 \ 1 & 4 & 9 \end{vmatrix}$.

2024.question: Evaluate the determinant $\begin{vmatrix} 1 & 1 & 1 \ a & b & c \ a^3 & b^3 & c^3 \end{vmatrix}$.
2024.prashna: सारणिक $\begin{vmatrix} 1 & 1 & 1 \ a & b & c \ a^3 & b^3 & c^3 \end{vmatrix}$ का मान ज्ञात करें।

2025.question: Solve: $\begin{vmatrix} x^2-x+1 & x-1 \\ x+1 & x+1 \end{vmatrix} = 2$
2025.prashna: हल करें: $\begin{vmatrix} x^2-x+1 & x-1 \\ x+1 & x+1 \end{vmatrix} = 2$
